name: Pyramid (itch) (Knight-fall)
description:
Controls - WASD to move, space/left mouse to shoot

Health is is top left corner.

You are Joe, an adventurous archeologist with a gun. You recently found out about a newly discovered entire pyramid that's cursed but up for exploring. Will you be strong enough to tackle this tall task?

made in 2:45 around, please rate.

sorry this was short, I just finished and its 9:40 where I have school tomorrow. I would have liked to do so, so much more, so perhaps I could update this atrocious game.
